Alert.dettaglioEseguito: The payment required for the notice %1 appears to have been successful. The payment receipt will be sent to the address provided.
Alert.dettaglioFallito: The payment required for the %1 alert does NOT appear to have been successful.

dettaglioInCorso.ok: The payment process has been completed successfully. We are awaiting confirmation of payment from the pagoPA platform.

timeout.ok: The payment process has been completed successfully, but there has been a delay in communicating the payment claim from the pagoPA platform. As soon as it is made available, we will send it to the email address.
timeout.errore: The payment process was completed without the payment of the due, but there was a delay in the communication of the payment attestation from the pagoPA platform. As soon as it is made available, we will send it to the email address.

dettaglioInCorso.errore: The payment process has been completed without the payment of the due amount. We are awaiting confirmation of payment from the pagoPA platform

compoundError.errorSub1: payment because the notice is canceled.
compoundError.errorSub2: payment since the notice has expired on %1.
compoundError.errorSub3: payment; there is no further information.
